explains: adj. 合法的；正当的；公正的；正直的

sentences.en: The stolen car was returned to its rightful owner.
sentences.cn: 被盗的汽车还给了其合法的主人。

sentences.en: We have restored Hamill to his rightful place as editor.
sentences.cn: 我们已经把哈米尔恢复到他本应有的编辑职位。

sentences.en: The police have now restored the painting to its rightful owner.
sentences.cn: 警察已经把这幅油画归还给了它的合法主人。
